import React from 'react' import '../../src/dist/css/output.css' export default function MovieMain(props) { console.log(props.data) return (

{props.data?.title}

IMDb

{console.log(props.data?.genres)}

{props.data?.runtime} dakika

{props.data?.overview}

) }
